Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. I'm busy. Can you leave me
alone?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*Yawn*, I'm so sleepy. <MYNAME>, what's
up? If there's nothing you need, don't
bother me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Geez, why do I have to see your face
from sun-up? Hurry up and tell me what
you want.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whaddya want, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Don't you have something to do? If you
have time to talk to me, get to work.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Geez, whaddya want? Do you have to
talk to me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You sure have time on your hands. Go and
find someone else to talk to. It's no
fun sticking around me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Go home already. I'm
getting sleepy.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're done with work, right? Then just
go straight home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I have an early start in the
morning. I'm sleepy, so go home. Cut me
some slack.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, have you been avoiding me? If
it's just my imagination, don't worry
it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You're early again this
morning. Focusing on work is a good
thing.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. Don't work too hard
right out the gate, okay? You'll get
tired out before lunch time!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, it's <MYNAME>. It's been boring
lately. Not much fun around here.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. How's work going? If you
need something, come see me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You'll get weak if you diet
for too long. When it's time to eat,
make sure you eat.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You could at least keep my updated on
your movements! I was worried about you.
Are you listening?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. What have you been doing
until so late? Well, I'm glad you
dropped in to see me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's late, <MYNAME>. Come earlier if you
want to say hello.
<PAGE>
I was about to come and find you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's this racket so early in the day?
Yeah, yeah, it's my fault, right? Sorry.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. I'm still sleepy.
*Yawn* I guess I'll go wash up.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I guess I'll do some work. <MYNAME>,
let's both do our best, eh.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What is it, <MYNAME>? Just do as you
please! I know you're not interested in
me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Want some help with
anything? I'll do it, just tell me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I was just thinking I wanted
to talk to you. It's important for
married couples to talk to each other.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Well, at last you talk to me. I thought 
you were in a bad mood.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, I know you're busy, but go easy,
okay? No need to work so hard that we
can't even talk.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. The sun's gone down, so I'm
gonna turn in. You'd better sleep too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The weather's nice today. You can get
lots of work done on days like this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What a depressing day. Clear up,
darn it!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A clear day is fine, but heat like this
is enough to dry you out! Why can't it
be just a bit cooler?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to the rain, it's gotten a bit
cooler. It's hard to work in this heat.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The clear skies of fall, eh? The air's
so clean and cool, it feels so good.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Boy, rain puts a damper on my spirits.
I hope it clears up today. I can't take
days like this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Boy, it's cold. Just going out is a
pain. How can you run around outside
like that?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No wonder it's cold, it's snowing.
Achoo! Brrr, so cold!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's with this weather anyway?! The
wind's gonna blow the house away! The
animals are panicking, too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is just too much snow! I've had
enough, just stop! I'll freeze!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm gonna reinforce the house so that
the typhoon doesn't blow it away. Just
leave it to me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
When it snows this much, work on the
farm really suffers. I hope it stops
soon!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The guys in town are gossiping that you
two are dating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, that's a good thing, right? You
fell in love and got together, so make
sure you stay together.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When walking in the forest, the animals
peek out once in a while. They're pretty
cute.
<PAGE>
I know it's not the right thing to do,
but I always end up feeding them.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, I hope you didn't mess with the
animals in the forest?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Listen. I'm not gonna stand for it if
you did.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not this forest, but when I was a kid
the forest was my playground. I know all
the fun things to do.
<PAGE>
I could teach you some stuff? Well, if
I feel like it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Maybe I'll fish, so that there'll be
more food. What? You can fish for your
own food.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The elders said there's a Goddess, but
I've never seen one. I wonder if she
really exists...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't dump trash on the mountain. You'll
ruin the impressive scenery.
<PAGE>
Also, if you see some trash then pick it
up. That's common sense for residents
of this town.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You have all this land. It's the perfect
place to raise animals. Lucky thing you
moved here, eh?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You were given this blessed land. You'll
suffer for it later if you don't make
the most of it now, I'm telling you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's dark, so watch your footing or
you'll take a tumble. Be careful,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you wanna play a guitar in a place
like this? The acoustics in here would
be awesome.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This town still only has a few people.
Now I don't like noisy towns, either,
but when it's this quiet...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a lot more people now. More
people come to my shop, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It means I've got busier, but that's
one side effect I don't really have a
problem with.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town's much more lively now than
when you first came, eh?
<PAGE>
I don't mind this level of energy, not
at all. It'll be nice if the town keeps
growing at this rate.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I never thought this town would ever get
as large as this!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When I think back, it used to be a ghost
town. I never want it to be like that
again.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? You're awfully talkative, aren't
you? But I'm not in the mood to talk.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I do in my free time? Well, I
like to play music.
<PAGE>
On what? A bass, bass guitar. I love
strum those low tones.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Huh? Want to hear me play? It'll take
more than just you asking, I can tell
you that! Silly!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I stocked up on animals to sell to you.
All good ones, you'll see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Take care of them on your farm. I'm
counting on you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I wonder how that old geezer's doing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hey, how long have you been there? Oh,
it's nothing.
<PAGE>
I never got along with my old man, so I
ran away and came here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>But now, a little older, I keep thinking
about him. Geez, so stupid.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The more you love animals, the more they
respond to you. They're different from
heartless humans.
<PAGE>
So remember... be kind to animals.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After I left home, I decided to become
an animal dealer because I've always
loved taking care of animals.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Wow, this is the first time I've ever
told anyone that...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You're the first one to take such an
interest in me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You may not agree, but I think you could
call us friends.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Oh man, you made me say something
embarrassing.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Come on, spit it out! If you hate me
then say so! I hate it when you're
vague!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Listen, <MYNAME>... you don't really know
how to get along with people, do you?
Not that I'm one to talk...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think you'll have any fun being
with me, but whatever floats your boat.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I go walking with you, all the
people in town look at us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>What a bother. Why are they so curious?
I just don't get it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm starting to know more and more about
you, <MYNAME>. I think this kind of
relationship is good.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're the first one to ever be straight
with me, and just look me in the eye.
That's what made me like you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Look what you made me say. It's
embarrassing. Gah!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, now that we're dating, what do
you think?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Personally, I hope we stay together like
this forever. I mean, we're inseparable.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't talk to me, <MYNAME>. You know why
I'm angry, don't you? Geez, this is the
pits.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Being married isn't much fun. I should
never have gotten married. *Sigh*

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Take care of me, like you take care of
the farm. It's not fun if we don't even
talk!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After getting married, I've had to
rethink my ideas on what it means to
live with someone else.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If anything happens to the animals on
the farm, you can leave it to me. That's
how I make my living, after all.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm, <MYNAME>, ever since I married you,
I feel more at peace. I don't go wild
like I used to.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>How can I put it...I found my reason for
living, and I'm ashamed of how rude I
was in the past.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>What I'm trying to say is... I'm glad I
married you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Uhh... How to put this? I'm very happy
right now.
<PAGE>
What brought this on? Well... I wanted
to thank you for all that you do, and
aw man, you spoiled it!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, don't laugh so much! I knew it,
I'm no good at this kind of stuff!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I said I'd go out with you, but what are
we supposed to do now? Uh...I don't know
about these things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'll leave it to you, <MYNAME>. Do what
you like.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Sheesh...what is it? Isn't it over with
me? Just leave me alone.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The other tell me how lucky I am, or to
not let you get away again...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They should mind their own business and
just leaver me along!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
We're gonna get married soon. I never
even dreamed that I'd get married...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's not like I'm living in my own
house, so when I wake up, I think, "Hey,
where am I?"

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I know you said you're pregnant. I'm
going to be a father? It just hasn't
sunk in yet.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm finally starting to feel like a
prospective father.
<PAGE>
I wonder which it'll be, a boy or a
girl? I think I'd prefer a girl.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A-A baby? Hey, how are we gonna raise a
baby? They just grow up on their own,
right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Huh? No? Then what do I do? What? Calm
down?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>...Okay.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm so worried about dropping the baby!
I didn't know newborns were so small.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How can something so tiny cry so loud?
Babies are so  strange.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Playing with <CHILD_NAME> is really tiring.
Children have endless energy.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME>is starting to look just like you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Looks like me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hah, I don't know about that. To be
honest, I can't tell.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When <CHILD_NAME> gets older, I wanna talk
about all kinds of things. I can't wait
for that day to come.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, shrimp chili! Hand it over! This is
my favorite.
<PAGE>
Let me try it. Ohhh! This is great!
Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Huh? What is it? This is for me? Are
you sure about that?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, since you insist, I'll accept,
but I won't return it even if you ask
me to later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this for me? A <ITEMNAME0>?
I like this.
<PAGE>
I was just thinking I how I wanted one.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What? You're giving this to me?
Okay, I'll take it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why're you giving this to me? I don't
need something like this. Isn't there
someone else who wants it?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I... hate this. <MYNAME>, you're doing
this on purpose, right? I'm getting mad.
<PAGE>
Don't give me this again. Got that?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What is it? A chocolate cake? This is
the one ting I hate the most. Don't you
care about my feelings at all?
<PAGE>
Geez, you really must hate me. Fine,
I'll take it. But I'll give it to
someone else.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, it's bigger than a normal
vegetable. Huh? For me? Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you're stronger than you look.
How did you bring that in here? Well,
thanks to your strength, I'll take it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present for me? No thanks. What reason
do I have to take anything from you?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't want that now. Why can't you see
there are more pressing matters between
us at the moment? Come on, get with it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What is it? A present, out of the blue?
That's creepy. No thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I already got one, so I don't want
another. I can't accept so many gifts.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just because we're going out, you don't
have to keep giving me presents.
Besides, I can't hold any more.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You just gave me one. Shape up,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? Want to see me?
<PAGE>
A birthday present for me? I just grew
one year older, that's all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I got to eat shrimp chili, so it was
a pretty good day.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What is that? A birthday present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for going to all the trouble.
It's nice, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? A birthday present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hmm, for me, eh? If you insist, I'll
accept. Thank you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My birthday present? You're giving me
this? Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What is this? A birthday present?
<PAGE>
Aren't you supposed to give something
I would like? I'm not keen on this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yup, it's my birthday all right. But
receiving something like this ruins
my day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS><MYNAME>, can't you be more considerate? 
I can't even get angry with you over
this. Just disappointed.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Cut it out, will you? I
don't like sweet things!
<PAGE>
Bringing it on my birthday? Chocolate
cake! The one thing I hate most in this
world!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Hmm, it's
a big vegetable. Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? It's huge.
I'm shocked! Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, you don't hold chicks like that.
This is the way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Yeah, that's it. Otherwise, it's
dangerous. They're just babies, y'know.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, they're looking good. The color
of the coxcomb is nice. You're taking
good care of them.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This one's huge. <MYNAME>, you raised
her well. You should be proud of
yourself.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look at that tail wag! So cute. Time
for some serious petting.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whatever have you been feeding your dog?
That's quite a... unique look.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You sure can bark. Uh-huh, you look
healthy. I can vouch for that.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When you're that fat, isn't it hard to
really cute, though!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This kitty likes people. Hey, don't lick
my face. *Laugh*

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, that's one overweight kitty.
Someone needs more exercise.
<PAGE>
At this rate, this cat can't move. Still
cute, though.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, okay. Good kitty. There, there.
So cute!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That fat might be useful in winter, but
exercise is really important.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Let me hold the cat... whoa, heavy! Time
to start a diet, I think.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What's with the flowers all of a sudden?
The Flower Festival...? Okay, if you're
giving them to me, I'll take them.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The Flower Festival? Flowers don't
really suit me...
<PAGE>
H-Hey, don't look like that. Okay, I'll
take them.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present for the Flower Festival?
Then I'll display them in the
house. <MYNAME>, thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't like sweet things. But I feel
like eating something sweet today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Listen, I just feel like it. Okay? So
don't bring me this on any other days!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Winter Harmony Day is nice, but I don't
care for sweets.
<PAGE>
Don't look like that. Okay, okay. I'll
eat them later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You really didn't have to do anything
for Winter Harmony Day. I really
couldn't care less.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't get upset. Okay, I'm happy. I'm
happy. Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Isn't this a kid's festival? So why...?
But I feel like eating sweets today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Listen, I just feel like it. Okay? So
don't bring me this on any other days!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The Pumpkin Festival is nice, but... I
don't like sweet things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't look like that. Okay, okay. I'll
eat them later, sheesh.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The Pumpkin Festival doesn't mean
anything to me! I don't want to eat this
junk.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hey, don't get mad... Okay. I'm happy,
happy. Okay? Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? What? What about this feather?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't get too close. I feel like
sneezing.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A blue feather is used just once in a
lifetime. I think it's too early for us.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
H-Hey wait. With me? Uhh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, darn it! <MYNAME>, come with me!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Arghhh! Enough! It's embarrassing!
<PAGE>
I'll marry you. That's what you want,
right? So please, put that away.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why show it to me? We're married. Can
you put that away? It's embarrassing.
Please, don't show it to the neighbors.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>! What're you playing at?
<PAGE>
The whole town's talking about you going
around with that blue feather. You're
embarrassing me! Cut it out, okay?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not interested, even if you show me
that ring. Find someone else.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? You're joking, right? Y-You can't
be serious? Hummm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Okay, I understand. Let's go over there.
This isn't the place to do this.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, <MYNAME>. It's embarrassing! Don't
